mapper.select:
select
from
and tenant_id = #{tenantId} and userid like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{userid}), '%') and createtime like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{createtime}), '%')
and lastmodifiedtime like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{lastmodifiedtime}), '%')
and property_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{propertyType}), '%')
and opera_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{operaType}), '%')
and amount like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{amount}), '%') and relate_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relateType}), '%')
and relate_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relateId}), '%') and expire_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{expireDate}), '%')
and vaild_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{vaildType}), '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into
( tenant_id, userid, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, property_type, opera_type, amount, relate_type, relate_id, expire_date, vaild_type) values
( #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.userid}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.lastmodifiedtime}, #{entity.propertyType}, #{entity.operaType}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.relateType}, #{entity.relateId}, #{entity.expireDate}, #{entity.vaildType})

insert into
( tenant_id, userid, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, property_type, opera_type, amount, relate_type, relate_id, expire_date, vaild_type) values
(#{entity.tenantId},#{entity.userid},#{entity.createtime},#{entity.lastmodifiedtime},#{entity.propertyType},#{entity.operaType},#{entity.amount},#{entity.relateType},#{entity.relateId},#{entity.expireDate},#{entity.vaildType})
on duplicate key update tenant_id=values(tenant_id), userid=values(userid), createtime=values(createtime), lastmodifiedtime=values(lastmodifiedtime), property_type=values(property_type), opera_type=values(opera_type), amount=values(amount), relate_type=values(relate_type), relate_id=values(relate_id), expire_date=values(expire_date), vaild_type=values(vaild_type)
